Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename BANK >
BankIter< BANK >::BankIter (  )  [inline]

C'tors /D'tors.

This class provides sequential access to various banks stored by the EventNavigator. As far as we are concerned here a bank is something like a PulseIslandList == vector<TPulseIsland*>

template<typename BANK >
BankIter& BankIter< BANK >::MatchAll (  ) 

Reset match criteria - accept everything. Note that once the Iter is Define()ed the criteria cannot be changed.

template<typename BANK >
BankIter& BankIter< BANK >::MatchNone (  )

template<typename BANK >
BankIter& BankIter< BANK >::Rewind (  ) 

Go back to start, and return self. So to get the first element do someBankIter.Rewind().Next(). Side Effects: Define()s this Iterator.
